name: Vegan Sticky Buns
description: Better than your average cinnamon roll, sticky buns are infused with a gooey caramel pecan topping and are sure to impress! Perfect for holiday mornings with an overnight option. Pop them in the oven in the morning and enjoy a decadent breakfast!
recipeIngredient: 4 1/2 cups all purpose flour, plus more as needed
4 tablespoons vegan butter, softened to room temperature

itemListElement.text: Microwave the soy milk for about 1 minute and 30 seconds, until warm but not too hot or it will kill the yeast.
itemListElement.name: Microwave the soy milk for about 1 minute and 30 seconds, until warm but not too hot or it will kill the yeast.

itemListElement.text: In a large bowl, add the warm soy milk, sugar and yeast. Stir a little bit; the yeast will get foamy.
itemListElement.name: In a large bowl, add the warm soy milk, sugar and yeast. Stir a little bit; the yeast will get foamy.

itemListElement.text: To the yeast mixture, add the melted vegan butter, salt and 4 1/2 cups of flour. Stir with a large spoon until it comes together. Add additional flour, as needed. Alternatively, use a stand mixer with a dough hook and mix on low until the mixture pulls away from the sides of the bowl. It should still be soft and slightly sticky.
itemListElement.name: To the yeast mixture, add the melted vegan butter, salt and 4 1/2 cups of flour. Stir with a large spoon until it comes together. Add additional flour, as needed. Alternatively, use a stand mixer with a dough hook and mix on low until the mixture pulls away from the sides of the bowl. It should still be soft and slightly sticky.

itemListElement.text: If using a stand mixer, simply mix with the dough hook until you have a smooth ball of dough. If not, turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface, and knead for 3-4 minutes until you have a smooth ball of dough.
itemListElement.name: If using a stand mixer, simply mix with the dough hook until you have a smooth ball of dough. If not, turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface, and knead for 3-4 minutes until you have a smooth ball of dough.

itemListElement.text: Place the dough in a lightly oiled bowl, cover with a towel and let it rise in a warm place for 20 minutes. Here's what I do: Turn the oven to 170 degrees F. Once heated, turn it off, place the covered bowl inside the oven, and leave the oven door cracked.
itemListElement.name: Place the dough in a lightly oiled bowl, cover with a towel and let it rise in a warm place for 20 minutes. Here's what I do: Turn the oven to 170 degrees F. Once heated, turn it off, place the covered bowl inside the oven, and leave the oven door cracked.

itemListElement.text: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (skip this for make ahead option) and grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.
itemListElement.name: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (skip this for make ahead option) and grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.

itemListElement.text: Spread the chopped pecans in the bottom of the greased pan.
itemListElement.name: Spread the chopped pecans in the bottom of the greased pan.

itemListElement.text: Combine the rest of the topping ingredients (vegan butter, brown sugar and maple syrup) in a small saucepan over medium heat. Stir until the butter has melted. Simmer for a few minutes, stirring frequently.
itemListElement.name: Combine the rest of the topping ingredients (vegan butter, brown sugar and maple syrup) in a small saucepan over medium heat. Stir until the butter has melted. Simmer for a few minutes, stirring frequently.

itemListElement.text: Remove from heat and pour it over the pecans in the dish.
itemListElement.name: Remove from heat and pour it over the pecans in the dish.

itemListElement.text: Sprinkle a clean counter or pastry mat with flour. Punch the dough down and use a rollin pin to roll the dough into a large rectangle, about 1/2 inch thick. Sprinkle with more flour to prevent sticking to the rolling pin.
itemListElement.name: Sprinkle a clean counter or pastry mat with flour. Punch the dough down and use a rollin pin to roll the dough into a large rectangle, about 1/2 inch thick. Sprinkle with more flour to prevent sticking to the rolling pin.

itemListElement.text: Spread the softened vegan butter over the dough, then sprinkle with brown sugar and cinnamon.
itemListElement.name: Spread the softened vegan butter over the dough, then sprinkle with brown sugar and cinnamon.

itemListElement.text: Starting with the long edge closest to you, roll the dough into a tight log.
itemListElement.name: Starting with the long edge closest to you, roll the dough into a tight log.

itemListElement.text: Using a serrated knife (or plain floss!) cut off the two ends. Slice the rest into 12 rolls.
itemListElement.name: Using a serrated knife (or plain floss!) cut off the two ends. Slice the rest into 12 rolls.

itemListElement.text: Place the rolls on top of the pecan mixture in the baking dish. Make ahead: Cover with plastic wrap and place in the refrigerator overnight. Or follow the next step to bake immediately.
itemListElement.name: Place the rolls on top of the pecan mixture in the baking dish. Make ahead: Cover with plastic wrap and place in the refrigerator overnight. Or follow the next step to bake immediately.

itemListElement.text: If you have refrigerated the rolls overnight, let them sit at room temperature for about an hour before baking. Bake for 30-35 minutes, until golden brown and the centers are cooked through.
itemListElement.name: If you have refrigerated the rolls overnight, let them sit at room temperature for about an hour before baking. Bake for 30-35 minutes, until golden brown and the centers are cooked through.

itemListElement.text: Remove the baking dish from the oven and immediately invert (very carefully!) onto a serving tray or other large baking dish.
itemListElement.name: Remove the baking dish from the oven and immediately invert (very carefully!) onto a serving tray or other large baking dish.

itemListElement.text: Serve these sticky sweet buns immediately and enjoy!
itemListElement.name: Serve these sticky sweet buns immediately and enjoy!

keywords: overnight sticky buns, vegan sticky buns
